attributes.action: Prosecute any MP’s caught fraudulently claiming expense as a criminal act against the citizens’ of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the overwhelming evidence that there is an epidemic of fraudulent expense claims amongst MPs. It is the public's perception that the Police and the Crown Prosecution Service will not bring criminal charges against any of them. This petition seeks to convey the public disgust and anger at the ability of MPs to abuse the expense claim system, stay in public office and carry on making moral judgements in the  interest of the citizens' of the UK.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
